College_Summary: BITS Pilani is one of India’s top private Universities located in Pilani. The university is known for its technical and research programs. India Today 2023 ranks BITS Pilani at ‘1’ in the Engineering category and ‘7’ in the overall category. The University has 3 more campuses besides its Pilani campus, i.e. Goa, Hyderabad, and Dubai. The flagship program of BITS Pilani is BE(Hons). Aspirants need to apply for BITSAT for BE (Hons) Admission. The first-year fee of BE(Hons) program is INR 5.72 Lakhs in 2023; for the rest 3 years, this fee increases by 10% annually. Furthermore, the average placement in BITS Pilani is INR 30.37 LPA. The top recruiters were Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Visa, Adobe, Cisco etc.

IIM Udaipur cut-off is 94 percentile (overall) for the personal interview round.

With about 4500 students enrolled in various programs, the university has a total of 14 departments offering UG, PG and Research programs in the fields of the Sciences, Arts and Social Sciences, and Commerce and Management along with several professional courses like Bachelors in Education, Fine Arts, Journalism, etc. This year, the University has also introduced several new professionals and co-educational programs such as Library and Information Science, Forensic Science, and a Diploma in Clinical Psychology. In addition to their degree courses, the candidates can also opt for Diploma/ Certificate programs.

VGU offers various. VGU has been accredited by National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) with ‘A+’ Grade. UG, PG, Research, and Diplomas in the stream of Engineering, Management, Law, Hotel Management, Pharmacy, and many more. Admissions are based on merit and entrance tests. The university conducts National Level Exam VGUCET for admission to its various UG, PG, and Diploma programs and provides scholarships across 75+ courses.

NLU Jodhpur Admission to the Integrated and PG courses is based on marks secured in CLAT and CAT/MAT/CMAT. College_Summary: IIT Jodhpur is a public university known for its engineering courses. IIT Jodhpur is ranked 30th under the Engineering category by NIRF 2023. IIT Jodhpur offers 40 courses in 11 departments where BTech and Mtech are the most popular courses. IIT Jodhpur considers JEE Advanced score for BTech Admission and the seat allocations are done via JoSAA. For IIT Jodhpur MTech admissions, GATE score is considered and seat allocations are done as per COAP counselling. The JEE Advanced cutoff for the BTech program at IIT Jodhpur is between 2270 and 14292. The average package at IIT Jodhpur was INR 21.30 LPA, while its highest package was INR 53 LPA. The M.Tech batch received 100% placements in the CSE and AI fields. The top recruiters in IIT Jodhpur Placements 2023 were Tata 1mg, Samsung, Oracle, Flipkart, Publicis Sapient, Mercedes Benz, Adobe, and other companies participated.

AIIMS Jodhpur is one of the six AIIMS established in 2012 by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India under the Pradhan Mantri Swasthya Suraksha Yojna (PMSSY). Recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI), the institute offers 40+ UG, PG, Doctoral, and Super-Speciality courses in the streams of Medicine, Dentistry, Nursing, Biotechnology, and Paramedical.

College_Summary: St. Xavier’s College, Jaipur was established in 2010 at Jaipur, in Rajasthan. The college offers 7 courses at UG level namely, B.A. in English Literature, Economics, Political Science, and Psychology. It also offers B.Com, BBA, and BCA whereas 4 courses at PG level namely, M.A. MHRM, and M.Sc. St. Xavier’s College is approved by AICTE and affiliated to the University of Rajasthan. In 2018-19, a total of 75 students was successfully placed at various companies with an average package of INR 3.20 LPA. The admissions at St. Xavier’s College, Jaipur is sought on a merit basis.

Central University of Rajasthan (CURAJ) is a central university located in Ajmer, Rajasthan, India. Established in 2009, CURAJ has been accredited with a grade of ‘A’ by NAAC and is approved by UGC. The university has also been ranked 151-200 under the overall category in NIRF Rankings 2022. CURAJ offers studies in technology, science, the humanities, business, management, public policy, and social science through its 12 schools, 30 academic departments, and one community college. Admission to the Amity University Jaipur is done on the basis of merit as well as entrance tests. Amity University is spread across an area of 120 acres with various facilities such as placement cell, hostels, hi-tech labs, library, cafeteria, etc. The University has more than 800 distinguished faculty and staff members. The University further provides various scholarships to the students.

College_Summary: JIHM (Jodhpur Institute of Hotel Management), Jodhpur is ranked 2nd in Rajasthan and ranked 30th out of 50 colleges for Hotel Management by The Week 2019. The institute offers a UG and a Diploma program in Hotel Management. Admission is done on the basis of merit and NCHMCT JEE exam scores. JIHM has placed more than 75% students. Some of the top recruiters are Trident, ITC Hotels, Radisson, Hilton, The Gateway Hotel, etc.

The college offers numerous undergraduate, postgraduate, PG Diploma, Certificate, and Doctorate courses in the fields of Law, Agriculture, Arts, Commerce, Home Science, Yoga and Vedic Sciences, management, and many more fields. Its admission procedure is carried out online and students are admitted based on merit or scores obtained in entrance tests, depending upon which course they desire to get into. The college is well furnished with all the facilities and has a highly qualified faculty team.

BIT Jaipur has recently placed a total of 84 students from the engineering stream, whereby the majority of students were from the CSE branch. The institute ranked 53 in Engineering college by NIRF, 2022.

College_Summary: College of Veterinary and Animal Sciences was established in the year 2007 and located at Navania, Vallabhnagar, Udaipur a beautiful city of Rajasthan. The college is currently providing M.V.Sc. and Ph.D. degrees in most of the disciplines. It also offers B.V.Sc. at UG level and Diploma in AH. Admission to B.V.Sc program is based on the rank secured by the candidate in Rajasthan Pre Veterinary Test (RPVT) and Ph.D. admission will be done through Pre PG Test. The university offers B.Sc. and M.Sc. courses in profuse specializations. Further, it also offers a Ph.D. (Agriculture) & Ph.D. (Home Science) in various specializations and 2 certificate courses through correspondence. The university is approved by UGC. Admissions to various UG & PG courses are sought through the entrance exam whereas, for Ph.D. admissions, the entrance exam is followed by an interview round. Applications are invited offline only.  In 2018-19, a total of 75 students were successfully placed in the recruitment drive.

It offers students 2 years of customized PGDM+SAP course with a dual internship facility. There are a number of specializations that are present for the PGDM+SAP course namely Marketing, Fincance, Human Resource, Entrepreneurship, Operations, and Information Technology.

Manipal University Jaipur offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various fields such as engineering, management, basic and applied sciences, humanities, social sciences, journalism and mass communication, and law. The university also offers various diploma and certificate courses in niche areas. Students who have completed the MET certificate exam administered by the university are admitted to the undergraduate programmes. Entrance to PG programmes is determined on merit.

Now, it has turned out to be a deemed to be university in collaboration with the Government of Rajasthan. This deemed University is approved by UGC, AICTE, AISHE, and ARIA. It has also been accredited by NAAC with 'A' Grade. It offers B.Tech., Integrated M.Tech., M.Tech., M.Sc., M.S (by Research) and Ph.D. programs in five disciplines.

Kanoria PG Mahila Mahavidyalaya offers various UG and PG programs as well as skill enhancement and career-oriented programs in the discipline of Science, Arts, Commerce, Computer Science, Biotechnology, Business Administration, Fashion Designing, Nutrition and Interior Design. The UG courses offered by the college are B.Sc, BA, BBA, B.Com, and BCA courses. PG programs offered by the college include MA, M.Sc, M.Com degree courses. Admission to Kanoria PG Mahila Mahavidyalaya is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the previous qualifying examinations. Some PG courses require UG Specialization in relevant fields.

College_Summary: Singhania University is a UGC approved university situated at Pacheri Bari, Distt. Jhunjhunu, Rajasthan. The university offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma as well as Doctoral programs. Singhania University Admission is based on the marks secured by the students in the qualifying degree or the entrance examinations conducted by the university or JEE Main, NEET, or valid score in JRF. Deserving students who graduate from Singhania University are placed in top-recruiting companies such as Wipro and Infosys.

College_Summary: The highlights of Jaipur National University is mentioned below:

JECRC University is a private university established by the JECRC Foundation National Society for Engineering, Research and Development (NSERD) in 2012 in Jaipur, Rajasthan. JECRC stands for Jaipur Engineering College and Research Centre. The university is spread over an area of 32 acres. It has more than 22,000 alumni and 16,000+ active students. JECRC University is approved by UGC and BCI. It is also accredited by NAAC and the NBA. JECRC University offers UG, PG, and Ph.D. courses. It has 11 schools or departments to offer higher education in Engineering & Technology, Computer Applications, Sciences, Business, Law, Design, Economics, Hospitality, Allied Health Sciences, Mass Communication, etc. All the courses of JECRC University are approved by AICTE. Admission to the JECRC University is done based on CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ JEE Mains/ CLAT entrance exams followed by Group Discussion and Personal Interviews. The university also offers Distance Learning Courses and Online Programs.

Sunrise University (SRU) is a Private University, located in Alwar, Rajasthan and was established in the year 2011. The University is approved by The University Grants Commission (UGC) and All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). SRU offers various Polytechnic Diploma, UG, Integrated, PG Diploma, PG, Ph.D., and M.Phil. courses. Admission to all the courses are Merit Bases except Ph.D. and M.Phil., where the applicant needs to appear for the Entrance Test and Personal Interview conducted by SRU.

Om Prakash Joginder Singh [OPJS] University established by the Government of Rajasthan as per Ordinance No. 16 of 2013, of the Rajasthan State Legislature in Churu district of Rajasthan. The Eco-Friendly University was promulgated by the Honourable Governor of Rajasthan in August 2013. The University has received accreditations from UGC, Bar Council of India, and Council of Architecture.

Poornima University is a private university established in 2012 located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. The university is spread over an area of 32 acres. The university is approved by UGC, NCHMCT, COA, CTE, and AIU. Poornima University is the youngest university in Rajasthan that has achieved a “Diamond” rating by QS I-GAUGE. Poornima University has been ranked in 34th position among the Best B-Schools in North India by India Today. It has also been ranked at 23rd position among the “Best Private University” in India by Times B-School. Poornima University offers admission to Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma, and Doctoral courses in the fields of Engineering, Architecture, Management, Commerce, Design, Science, Public Health, Computer Applications, and Hotel Management.

Mody University was established in the Sikar district of Rajasthan in the year 1998. The prime goal behind the formation of the university was to help women achieve their career perspectives. Mody University provides an opportunity for them to study and ensures that it offers them all the facilities and help. The University has been approved and recognised by BCI, UGC and NBA. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in different disciplines like Arts, Science, Commerce, Engineering, Management, Law, Fashion, Interior Design, Architecture, Physiotherapy, Agriculture etc.

International Institute of Hotel Management (IIHM), Jaipur Rajasthan was established in 2011. IIHM Jaipur is ranked 48th under the Hotel Management category by The Week 2023 and 66th under the Hotel Management category by India Today 2023. The institute offers UG and PG Courses and some of the programs are offered in affiliation with the IGNOU.

College_Name: Institute of Advanced Studies in Education (IASE) University
College_Summary: The Institute of Advanced Studies in Education (IASE) is a deemed university in Sardarshahar, Rajasthan, India. The university is accredited as a "B+" institute by the NAAC. It is located in Churu District of Rajasthan. The University is affiliated with the Government of India. MHRD declared the institute Deemed to be University.

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, PCI, CCH, CCIM, BCI, UGC

College_Summary: Jayoti Vidyapeeth Women's University, Jaipur was established in 2008 under the Rajasthan State Legislature Act 17. The Jayoti Vidyapeeth Women’s University is India’s First Private State Women’s University. It is recognized by UGC and accredited by NAAC. The university has more than 30,000 enrollments. It offers 120+ academic programs. The university provides admission to regular, distance and research courses. Regular programs are offered for women only and distance education programs are available for men and women both. It has a student-faculty ratio of 1:9. Admission to the university is based on merit in various national and state-level examinations. It also offers direct admission based on merit in the previous qualifying examination. The university has published 2300+ research papers and 59 patents and has filed more than 50 copyrights.

The university was set up by the Government of Rajasthan Jaipur under Act No. 16 of 2008, passed in state Assembly of Rajasthan, giving it the status of 'State University'. The university has been recognized by UGC and approved by AICTE and PCI.

The university has various faculties under which a wide range of UG, PG & research based programs are offered. Some of the faculties are Commerce & Management, Law, Engineering & Technology, Agriculture Science, Basic & Applied Sciences and various others.

College_Summary: Jagannath University Jaipur was established in 2008. It is a private university located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. The university has been recognized by UGC and accredited by NAAC.

IIIT Kota, deemed to be a university of National Importance, established in 2013, is located at Ranpur near Kota. IIIT Kota is a Public-Private-Partnership (PPP) initiative between the Governments of Rajasthan, India, and the Ministry of Education (MoE). IIIT Kota offers UG, PG, and doctoral degrees and these courses are provided in the Engineering discipline. IIIT Kota provides a 4-year BTech program based on the JEE Mains entrance exam followed by the JoSAA counselling. For the year 2023, IIIT Kota cutoff ranged from 19195-31608 rank for the general category. Also, IIIT Kota offers an MTech program at the PG level based on the GATE scores. IIIT Kota placements 2023 report is out. During the IIIT Kota placements in 2023, the highest package received by the institute was INR 53.6 LPA whereas the average package went up to INR 14.6 LPA. The top employers included Capgemini, OYO, Infosys, Amazon, Microsoft, Goldman Sachs, Oracle, TCS, Samsung, and Adobe. The overall placement rate for IIIT Kota placements in 2022 was 83.01%.

Pacific University, established in 2010, is a Private University in Udaipur, Rajasthan. The university offers various courses in the fields of Engineering, Management, Dentistry, Pharmacy, Computer Application, Hotel Management, Fire & Safety Management, etc. Admission to these courses is either merit-based or entrance based. Graduates from Pacific University get placed in reputed companies such as NIIT, Collabera, Chai Point, IDBI Federal, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Atlas, WPW, Omnichrome, etc. with the highest salary package up to 12 LPA.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Computer Applications [BCA] + Master of Computer Applications [MCA]

College_Summary: Tantia University, commonly referred to as TU is a state university in Rajasthan. It was established by Rajasthan Govt. Act No. 32 of 2013 u/s 2(f) of the UGC Act, 1956. The university offers a wide range of the courses at UG and PG level along with Ph.D. degrees in around 11 disciplines. The approvals have been granted to the university by AICTE, BCI, Ministry of Ayush, NCTE and INC. The university has a good ranking and reputation in its state.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary: Jagdishprasad Jhabarmal Tibrewala University (JJTU) is a private university in Jhunjhunu, India. The institute was established in the year 2009 & is recognized by UGC, New Delhi. It offers multiple UG, PG, Diploma, PG Diploma, Doctoral, and certificate courses in various specializations like Arts, Science, Commerce, Management, Engineering, Library Science, Law, Nursing, Pharmacy, architecture, etc.

Swami Keshvanand Institute of Technology, Management, and Gramothan [SKIT Jaipur] is in Pink City, Jaipur, and it was established in 2000. SKIT Jaipur is accredited with a grade of A+ by NAAC and approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi, and the Govt. of Rajasthan. The institute was awarded rank no. 1 by Rajasthan Technical University, Kota, in 2023.

College_Logo: https://images.collegedunia.com/public/college_data/images/logos/1394438723Maharana Pratap University of Agricultural and Technology (MPUAT).png?h=80&w=80&mode=stretch
College_Summary: Maharana Pratap University of Agriculture and Technology, also known as MPUAT Udaipur, is a state university established in 1999 by Rajasthan Agricultural University. MPUAT is accredited by ICAR, recognized by AICTE and affiliated to Association of Indian Universities (AIU). The institute offers various graduates, postgraduates, doctoral level courses in Agriculture, Fisheries, Dairy and Food, Engineering and Technology.

Maharishi Arvind University is a private university located at Jaipur, Rajasthan. It is commonly known as MAU and was established by the Government of Rajasthan in the year 2015. The university has got approval from UGC, AICTE as well as NCTE. The university has a total of 9 departments under which it offers undergraduate, postgraduate, Ph.D., and diploma programs in different streams. The most popular courses offered by the university are B.Sc, MBA, MCA, Diploma, and Ph.D. programs respectively.

College_Name: National Academy of Event Management and Development- [NAEMD], Jaipur
College_Summary: National Academy of Event Management and Development, also known as NAEMD came into existence in the year 2003 at Jaipur. NAEMD Jaipur offers undergraduate course BBA in Event Management and PR and diploma programme in 2 specializations. For graduate students, there is an MBA in Event Management and PR as well as 2 PG Diploma courses. Admissions to all UG and PG courses are made on merit basis as well as based on performance in entrance test and interview.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration [BBA] (Event Management & PR)

College_Summary: The Poornima College of Engineering was established in the year 2000 and is affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University and approved by AICTE. The College is accredited by NBA. The College offers engineering programme in numerous specializations. Admission in the courses is based on Entrance Exam. The RTU has ranked the College at #2 position. Its the most preferred college of engineering with 100% admissions

Geetanjali University (GU) is a private university established at Udaipur of Rajasthan in 2011. The University operates a variety of subsidiary institutions such as Geetanjali College of Nursing (GCN), Geetanjali Medical College and Hospital (GMCH), Geetanjali Dental Research Institute (GDRI), Geetanjali Institute of Pharmacy (GIP), and Geetanjali College of physiotherapy (GCP).

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Summary: Shridhar University is a self- financed University which was established by the Government of Rajasthan in 2010. Located in Pilani, Rajasthan, the University offers a total of 25 courses across 8 different streams. Admissions to technical courses like B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA are mainly on the basis of the online entrance test of Shridhar University, JEE Mains, CAT and GATE, however admission to non-technical courses like B.Sc, M.Sc are merit-based. Application form for admission to the programs offered by Shridhar University can be filled in both online and offline format.

University of Engineering & Management (UEM) Jaipur is a state-private university established in 2012. UEM Jaipur is accredited by NAAC and approved by AICTE & UGC. The institute is ISO certified and holds the membership of IAP, AIU, ACU UK, and IAU France. UEM Jaipur has been ranked in 1st position in North India by the Ministry of Education, Government of India under the Institution’s Innovation Council. It offers UG, PG, Doctoral and Certificate programs in the fields of Engineering, Management and Physiotherapy. UEM Jaipur is a mentor institute under the mentor-mentee scheme of AICTE. It is also ranked 1st in the Times B School ranking for Rajasthan. The institute also recieved the certificate for ‘Best Placement University’ by Global Education Achievers Award 2019-20

College_Name: Jaipur Engineering College and Research Centre, Jaipur

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Summary: Central Electronics Engineering Research Institute Pilani Rajasthan, institute was established in 1953 for advanced research and development in the field of Electronics. CEERI is a research institute and a constituent laboratory of Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR India), New Delhi.

Jaipur Engineering College (JEC Jaipur) is one of the leading facilities accredited by AICTE. The institute offers a total of 12 UG and PG courses in multiple specializations out of which B.Tech and M.Tech courses are popular. This university is the state's first nodal center of NITTTR, Chandigarh. Additionally, it is the primary remote center of IIT Bombay & IIT Kharagpur. Admission to the college is both merit and entrance-based. The admission process for B.Tech programs is based on JEE Main/REAP whereas the admission process for the M.Tech program is merit-based. Applicants may apply through the official website or they may also visit the campus in person to fill the application form. The institute also provides a variety of scholarships – merit-based, need-based, student-specific, career-specific and college-specific to encourage students as well as aid them for the purpose of learning.

Sangam University was established in 2012 by the Badral Soni Charitable Trust in Bhilwara, Rajasthan. It is among the top ten private engineering Colleges in Rajasthan and has been approved by multiple governmental associations. The university offers a total of 12 undergraduate, 5 post graduate, and 3 diploma, in addition to some doctoral and post-doctoral courses. Graduates from the university are placed in companies such as HDFC Bank, Indusind Bank, Wipro, Cognizant and Accenture, etc. All the admissions at the college entrance-based. Applicants have only an offline option to apply for the admission at different schools of Sangam University.

The University offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, integrated and diploma courses in Agriculture, Arts, Commerce, Engineering, Law, Management & Social Science for educating stars for tomorrow. Admission to RNBGU Bikaner is on the basis of the entrance exam. Candidates can either fill the application form online/offline. Additionally, RNBGU has a Centre for Leadership Development Cell for students to get opportunities across a wide range of industries and companies visiting the campus every year.

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, AICTE, RCI, PCI, RNC, BCI, UGC, AIU

College_Summary: Apex University (AU), Jaipur was established by the Rajasthan State Legislature Act No. 27 of 2018. It is a private university established in the year 1965. It is recognized by the UGC and is approved by the AICTE. Apex University was ranked 1st in the emerging university of Rajasthan by Forbes India. The University is also approved by the Bar Council of India (BCI), Pharmacy Council of India (PCI) and National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE). Recently, Apex University has been the most preferred university with more than 3.5 lakh registrations as per CUET 2023.

Courses_Details.Course Rating:
Rated #109
          out of 120
          by
        Outlook in Arts

College_Name: Siddhivinayak College of Science and Higher Education, Alwar

College_Summary: Asians Institute of Technology is a private Institute established in 2009 by Gayatri Devi Shiksha Sansthan in partnership with the Government of Rajasthan. The Institute has been affiliated with Rajasthan Technical University, Kota and approved by AICTE. AIT is known for its flagship B.Tech and admissions are offered through Rajasthan Engineering Admission Process (REAP) based on JEE Mains score.

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, AICTE, PCI, BCI, UGC, AIU

College_Summary: Bhagwant University is a private university located in Ajmer, Rajasthan. It was established in the year 2008 by Govt. of Rajasthan and managed by Bhagwant Group of Institutes which was established in 1999 by the team of professionals and NRIs. The university is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC). It is well set in the lush green area and provides the world-class infrastructure to its students. The university offers the variety of undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral courses in multiple disciplines.

ICFAI University in Jaipur is a part of ICFAI Group imparting knowledge in the fields of Arts, Science, Commerce, Management, Engineering, and Law. Graduates from the university are placed in top recruiting companies such as Asian Paints, ITC, BYJU’s, Capital First, OYO Rooms, HDFC AMC, etc. The average salary package offered is INR 4 LPA and the highest salary package offered is INR 17 LPA. Admission at the university is both merit and entrance-based followed by the interview rounds.

University of Technology, Jaipur is established through State Legislature under Act No 28 of 2017 by the govt of Rajasthan. UOT Jaipur provides 100% placement assistance to students. The highest package offered was worth INR 7.18 lacs per annum. The university offers degree and doctoral programs in the discipline of Engineering, Polytechnic, Pharmacy, Nursing, etc.

College_Name: College Of Technology And Engineering Udaipur
College_Summary: College Of Technology And Engineering Udaipur, established in the year 1964 has been recognized as Outstanding Engineering College in the Northern Region.  The college offers a number of UG degree programs in 8 branches, PG level programs in  12 disciplines, and doctorate level programs in 9 disciplines with multiple specializations. Admission to all the courses is done on the basis of the score obtained in the entrance exam followed by GD and PI. The college additionally offers an MBA program in Engineering.

College_Name: Rajasthan Institute of Engineering and Technology - [RIET], Jaipur
College_Summary: Rajasthan Institute of Engineering and Technology (RIET), Jaipur, is a premier technical & management institution, which was established in the year 2000 by a prominent group of Educationists and Philanthropists, Chandrawati Education Society, with a vision of establishing a World Class Education and Training Institute that creates a vibrant community of Intellectuals and Entrepreneurs by generating creativity, competence and commitment in their character to ensure sustainable development of society. The institution is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) New Delhi and it is duly affiliated with Rajasthan Technical University (RTU), Kota. The institute offers many specializations of engineering disciplines at Undergraduate and Postgraduate levels with MCA and MBA Courses altogether as a part of the curriculum.

Vivekananda Institute of Technology (VIT), Jaipur is a private engineering college established in the year 2008. It is affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University and is approved by AICTE. Presently, it is running a B.Tech. the program across 5 specializations. It also offers lateral entry to the course. Admission to the VIT Jaipur is done on the basis of JEE Main and REAP Counselling. The institute has excellent infrastructural facilities and a good placement record. In the year 2019, VIT has placed more than 2515 students with the highest package of INR 10 LPA and the average package of INR 2.5 LPA. The highest international package is recorded at INR 53 LPA. Some of the top recruiters include Wipro, Microsoft, HDFC, Intel, Amazon, Accenture, Oppo, etc.

College_Name: IILM Academy of Higher Learning, Jaipur
College_Summary: IILM Academy of Higher Learning is a Private Institute situated in Jaipur, State of Rajasthan. It is one of the best management institutes was established in the year 1998. The institute works with an aim to provide quality education which encourages students. IILM JAIPUR offers the flagship course of Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM)  in multiple streams. Admission to the courses is done on the basis of MAT, CAT, XAT, ATMA, RMAT score followed by  Interview and written analysis. IILM is offering a unique student development initiative in the form of Personal Leadership Programme (PLP) and Career Development Programme (CDP).

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in International Economics

College_Summary: SS Jain Subodh PG College was established in 1954. The college offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral courses in the field of Science, Commerce, and Arts. Admission in Undergraduate programs is based on class XII merit and in Postgraduate programs, on marks secured by the student in the Bachelor’s Degree. For Ph.D. courses, admission is done on the basis of the RTU-DAT Entrance exam.

Anand International College of Engineering (Anand ICE), Jaipur is awarded ‘Grade A’ Engineering college in Rajasthan by RTU, Kota and ranked 5th among the 'Top Emerging Private Institutes Of India' by the Times of India. The institute has an average record of 100% placement for the last 3 years. The highest salary package offered amounts to INR 12 LPA. AICE Jaipur offers an undergraduate course in the discipline of Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, etc.

Global Institute of Technology (GIT) situated in Jaipur has ranked consistently among the top 5 Engineering colleges in Rajasthan and it was set up in the year 2002. The institute imparts the best education and knowledge in the field of Engineering & Technology. It is affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University.

Government Engineering College (GEC), Ajmer is an autonomous college of Rajasthan Govt. established in the year 1997. It offers B.Tech programs at the UG level and M.Tech, MBA & MCA programs at the PG level. The college has modern infrastructural facilities, well-equipped labs, and Wi-Fi connectivity. Faculty members are well qualified to nurture the learning of students. The scenario of placements here is quite positive with the participation of reputed companies in the placement drive

Established in 2013 under Rajasthan State Government Act, Maulana Azad University is a leading state private university located in Jodhpur. The University has been a global knowledge center and boasts of educating more than 8000 students in multiple disciplines like Pharmacy, Technology, Management, Education, Science, Commerce, Arts etc.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Tourism Management

College_Summary: MBM Engineering College or Mugneeram Bangur Memorial Engineering College is a pioneer technical institute established in 1951 by Rajasthan Govt. It is affiliated to Jai Narain Vyas University, Jodhpur. Presently, it is running B.Tech & B.Arch. at the UG level and MCA and M.Tech at the PG level. Some of the courses have the approval of AICTE and is granted by UGC. The CSE Department of MBM College has collaboration with IBM USA for student’s training

Sir Padampat Singhania University (SPSU) was established by JK Cement Nimbahera Foundation through legislation of ‘Sir Padampat Singhania University Act 2008’ by Govt. of Rajasthan. It is located on a 100-acre campus with all modern amenities. SPSU has a current strength of nearly 750 students (excluding 79 Ph.D Scholars) and 54 faculty members. The current student-to-teacher ratio at SPSU is 14:1. The university has two schools: School of Engineering and School of Management, both offering programs at the undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral levels. Admission to courses is granted on the basis of the score obtained in the SPSAT entrance exam conducted by the university. Check: SPSU Admission

Pratap University, Jaipur, established in the year 2011 with the permission of the Rajasthan Government, offers admissions both to domestic and international students. Pratap University, better known as PU, offers multiple courses in various streams like Engineering, Management, Humanities, Information Technology, and Pharmacy. It offers UG, PG and Diploma courses to the students with a wide range of specialization to choose from. Admission is based on entrance examinations such as CAT, JEE (Mains), etc.

Bikaner Technical University in Rajasthan, popularly known as BTU Bikaner is an engineering and management college imparting technical knowledge to students through 7 programs. The courses offered at the university are B.Tech, B.Arch, B.Design, M.Tech, MBA, MCA, and Ph.D. Admission to the courses is both merit and entrance based. The final selection of the student for the admission is done only after the REAP counseling is completed.

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Summary: Shyam University (SU), Dausa, Rajasthan, was established in the year 2018, under the recognition of the University Grants Commission(UGC). The institution is affiliated to AICTE, PCI, NCTE and approved under the government of Rajasthan. The University is spread over 38.25 acres of land surrounded by Aravali Hills in pollution-free, lush green and eco-friendly environment.

College_Name: Arya College of Engineering and IT
College_Summary: Arya College of Engineering and IT (ACEIT) is one of the leading institutes of national significance located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. ACEIT is accredited by NAAC and approved by the AICTE and accredited by NAAC. The college has also been accredited with an ‘A’ grade by affiliating university since the inception of QIV. Arya College of Engineering and IT is affiliated to the Rajasthan Technological University (RTU), Kota. ACEIT offers 6 UG and 4 PG courses in the field of Engineering and Management. The flagship courses of ACEIT a B.Tech program across 6 specializations and an M.Tech degree course in 3 specializations. Candidates with Diploma in Engineering can also opt for lateral entry to the B,Tech course. ACEIT also runs a =n MBA degree program across 3 specializations. The institute shortlists candidates on the basis of JEE mains scores for the B.tech program. However, admission to the M.Tech course depends on candidate’s performance in GATE.  are Admission to the courses at ACEIT is done through the entrance examination. The institute accepts CAT scores for MBA admission. Check ACEIT Admissions

Institute of Engineering and Technology, Alwar was established in the year 1998. IET is promoted by All India Society for Advance Education and Research. College is Rajasthan Technical University, Kota and is approved by AICTE.

NIIT University (NU) is a not for profit UGC (University Grants Commission) approved institution. A premier institution, marked by higher learning and research, NU seeks to create original thinkers who will lead the knowledge society of the future. The University offers 4-year programs in B.Tech. (Computer Science & Engineering, Electronics & Communication, Biotechnology, Data Science, and Cyber Security), 4-year Integrated MBA (Marketing & Marketing Analytics, Entrepreneurship, Finance Banking & FinTech, Business Analytics, Communication & Media studies, Digital & Social Media Marketing), 4-year Integrated M.Sc (Computer Science) and 3-year BBA (Finance, Banking & Insurance, Digital Marketing, Business Analytics, Family Managed Business).

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] + Master of Technology [M.Tech]
Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] + Master of Science [M.S]
Master of Business Administration [MBA] (Information Systems & Data Engineering)

College_Summary: Arya College of Engineering is amongst the Top Institutes in Rajasthan for Engineering and for Higher Technical Education. ACE Jaipur was founded in the year 2005 and has become the most prominent College in the state as well as the Best Engineering Colleges in Jaipur. All courses at Arya College of Engineering are affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University and approved by AICTE. Check: ACE Jaipur Jaipur Courses and fees

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Technology [M.Tech] (Computer Science and Engineering)

College_Summary: The contribution of Homoeopathy University in the field of Homoeopathic education & research has been quite significant. It has become a premier institute in providing quality education of Homeopathy and brilliant research facilities for the students and research scholars.

University of Rajasthan (UNIRAJ) is Rajasthan's oldest Institution of higher education established in 1947. UNIRAJ is accredited by the NAAC with an ‘A+’ grade and is awarded the status of "University with Potential for Excellence" by the UGC. The central campus of UNIRAJ is spread over 338.14 acres in the city of Jaipur. The university has a total of 26,883 students and 711 faculty members, making the student-to-faculty ratio at UNIRAJ 37:1.

College_Name: Dr B. Lal Institute of Biotechnology
Rajasthan College of Engineering for Women, Jaipur
College_Summary: Established in 2002, Rajasthan College of Engineering for Women is a private institute affiliated to RTU, Kota and approved by AICTE. RCEW offers B.Tech in 4 specializations, M.Tech in 3 specializations, MBA in 3 specializations and an MCA course. To take admission to the B.Tech course, students need to obtain atleast 45% marks in their board examination. For the PG courses, candidate’s are required to have atleast a bachelor’s degree. Check: RCEW Jaipur Admission

College_Summary: Lords University, Alwar is a self-financed private university, an endeavor of the Chachan Education & Welfare Society, Chikani, Alwar which has already been a major influence in the educational pursuits of the learners and aspirants from surrounding areas. The university offers UG, PG and Diploma Courses offered in Pharmacy, Agriculture, Science, Management, Arts and Social Sciences, Education, and many more.

College_Name: Geetanjali Institute of Technical Studies - [GITS], Udaipur
College_Summary: Geetanjali Institute of Technical Studies (GITS), Udaipur is ranked 1st college in Southern Rajasthan by Rajasthan Technical University as per Quality Index Value Ranking and ranked 5th college in Rajasthan by GHRDC-CSR for quality. GITS Udaipur offers degree courses in the discipline of Engineering, Business Administration, etc.

College_Name: Poornima Institute of Engineering and Technology
College_Summary: Poornima Institute of Engineering Technology was established in 2007 under Shanti Education Society, a registered Society with an objective of setting up educational institutions like Engineering colleges, research institute for the advancement and propagation of education and research. The "Shanti Education Society" visualized  setting up state-of-art center of engineering and management education at the forefront in Rajasthan. Within a short period of seven years, the society has significantly excelled in academics and has earned leading good name in field of technical education.

College_Summary: Raj Engineering College (REC), Jodhpur was started by the efforts of Manav Kalyan Vikas Sikshan Sansthan (MKVSS). The society was founded in 2000 with the objective of contribution towards education, social & economic growth of western Rajasthan. REC is one of the several institutions run by the society. It situated ahead to Banar village & before Dangiyawas, Jaipur – Jodhpur Highway.

College_Name: Laxmi Devi Institute of Engineering and Technology - [LIET], Alwar
College_Summary: Laxmi Devi Institute of Engineering and Technology, Alwar established in the year 2001 by Marut Nandan Educational Society with a vision of becoming an institute of excellence for engineering and management education based on global standards. The institution is ranked number 2 in the state by Bikaner Technical University. It offers Diploma, Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in Engineering and Management.

College_Name: R.A. Podar Institute of Management Jaipur
College_Summary: R.A Podar Institute of Management, commonly known as RAPIM, was established in the year in 1974 at J.L.N Marg, Jaipur. It is a constituent of the faculty of management of University of Rajasthan. RAPIM offers MBA, MBA (service management), MBA (Executives) programme along with a Ph.D. programme in Management.

College_Name: Compucom Institute Of Information Technology And Management- (CIITM), Jaipur
College_Summary: Compucom Institute Of Information Technology And Management, Jaipur is affiliated with RTU and approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). It offers B.Tech, BCA at the UG level, and MBA, MCA, and M. Tech at the PG level. For admission in B.Tech candidates must have valid scores in REAP, and for MBA valid scores in RMAP. The institute provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The highest Package was offered at INR 14.7 LPA and the average package was at INR 3.6LPA, Industry exposure, and Internship facilities. Check: CIITM Placement

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Summary: Sobhasaria Group Of Institutions, Sikar, Rajasthan offers various courses BBA, B.Sc, BA, BCA, at UG level, MBA and M.Tech at PG level and doctoral degree across various specializations. Admission to B.Tech is based on valid JEE Main scores whereas admission to M.Tech is on the basis of GATE scores. For admission in MBA candidates must have valid CAT/CMAT scores. The institute provides internship to MBA, BBA and BCA students in various top-notch companies such as HCL, BSNL, Ducat, Maruti Suzuki and many more.

College_Name: GD Memorial Group of Colleges, Jodhpur
College_Summary: G.D.Memorial Group of College, Jodhpur is a private institution affiliated to Jai Narain Vyas University, Bikaner Technical University, Rajasthan University of Health and Science and is approved by AICTE, Pharmacy Council of India, NCTE, DGT NCVT and Government of Rajasthan. The college offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programs across multiple disciplines such as Science, Humanities, Management, Commerce, Computer Application, Education and Engineering.

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, DCI, PCI, IAP, BCI, UGC

College_Name: Arya Institute of Engineering Technology and Management - [AIETM], Jaipur
College_Summary: Arya Institute of Engineering Technology & Management (AIETM) was founded by the Arya Group of Colleges in 2013. The institute is popularly known for its B.Tech course which is offered in 4 specializations namely Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Electrical Engineering.

College_Name: BK Birla Institute of Engineering and Technology
Baldev Ram Mirdha Institute of Technology - [BMIT], Jaipur

College_Summary: Shankara Institute of Technology, established in 2001 is affiliated to RTU, Kota and University of Rajasthan and approved by AICTE. SIT offers B.Tech, BBA, B.Ed and BCA courses at the undergraduate level and offers MBA and MCA courses at the postgraduate level. Admission to the B.Tech course is done based on the candidate’s performance in the Common Admission Test. MCA admissions are done based on the candidate’s performance in RMCAAT, whereas for MBA, students need to hold a valid CMAT Score. The college is committed to providing 100% placement assistance & building the students confidence to face the challenges in their professional lives. The SIT also conducts the Common Admission Test cum Scholarship Test.

College_Name: Techno India NJR Institute of Technology - [TINJRIT], Udaipur
National Academy Of Sports Management (NASM), Jaipur

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Sports Management [PGDSM]

College_Name: Arya College of Engineering & Research Centre - [ACERC] Jaipur
College_Summary: Arya College of Engineering & Research Centre (ACERC), Jaipur was founded in 2007 under Arya Group of Colleges. All Courses at Arya College of Engineering & Research Centre are affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University (RTU, Kota) and are approved by AICTE.

College_Name: Bhartiya Institute of Engineering & Technology - [BIET], Sikar
College_Summary: Bhartiya Institute of Engineering & Technology (BIET), Sikar was established in 2008. It is proud of having highly qualified, experienced and dedicated faculty members of national repute who have been instrumental in realizing the dream of providing world-class technical education. It is situated in Sikar, Rajasthan. The institute also provides a highly qualified faculty as well as state of the art infrastructure to aid the learning experience.

College_Name: Dr Radhakrishnan Institute of Technology - [DRIT], Jaipur

College_Summary: Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri Engineering College (SLBS), Jodhpur was established in 2008. SLBS is a Unit of Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri Research & Training Institute.

College_Name: Pacific Academy of Higher Education & Research Society - [PAHER], Udaipur
College_Summary: Pacific Academy of Higher Education and Research Society (PAHER Society), Udaipur situated in Rajasthan is a global knowledge destination educating students in multiple disciplines like technology, medicine, dental, management, engineering, commerce, pharmacy, hotel management, computer application, arts education, fashion technology, media and mass communication, science etc. The Institute strongly supports existing areas of excellence, and identifying and promoting new area.  They empower students with educational opportunities for their technical, professional and social development, in today’s competitive and dynamic global society.

College_Name: Jodhpur Institute of Engineering and Technology - [JIET], Jodhpur
College_Summary: Jodhpur Institute of Engineering and Technology (JIET), Jodhpur is an esteemed and prestigious institution of Engineering and Management in Rajasthan, devoted to the cause of promoting technical and scientific literacy and temperament in the young inquisitive minds right from its inception in 2003. The multi-disciplinary campus JIET is a trustworthy name in Rajasthan as it provides multiple opportunities for gaining insights into professional education through the availability of resources.

Gyan Vihar School of Engineering and Technology [GVSET], Jaipur
College_Summary: Gyan Vihar School of Engineering and Technology (GVSET) embarked on as a private educational institute in 2000, in Jaipur, Rajasthan. The institute offers a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the field of Engineering, Science, and Technology like B.Tech, M.Tech, Diploma. Admissions are done through both merit and entrance examinations like JEE, GATE, GVSAT. The application mode is online.

College_Summary: Viet Institute of Engineering and Technology (VIET), established in 2007, is approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University (RTU), Kota and Bikaner Technical University (BTU), Bikaner. VIET offers a four year full-time residential bachelor’s degree course leading to BTech degree in five emerging frontier of technology namely CSE, ECE, EEE, EE, ME with an aim to impart new values and skills to those who have potential and are willing to face challenges of the new millennium as technocrats. This institute offers a maximum salary package of INR 12 LPA and the faculty available in this institute are highly knowledgeable and experienced.

College_Name: Kautilya Institute of Technology and Engineering - [KITE], Jaipur
College_Summary: Kautilya Institute of Technology and Engineering was established in 2002, affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University, Kota and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. The college offers undergraduate as well as postgraduate courses in various disciplines like Business Management, Engineering and Technology. The KITE has the privilege of becoming the first private engineering college of Rajasthan to start B.Tech (Civil Engineering), M.Tech (Structural Engineering) and M.Tech (Transport Engineering) and is now also certified by ISO 9001-2015.

College_Name: Maharishi Arvind College of Engineering and Research Center - [MACERC], Jaipur

College_Summary: Shekhawati Group of Institutions have been promoted by the Gurukul Shikshan Sansthan a non-profit organization founded in 2002, in Sikar. The AA+ Shekhawati Group of Institutions is dedicated to promoting professionals and technical education in the state and is presently conducting various programs at undergraduate and postgraduate levels from Institutions. The Programs are approved by AICTE New Delhi, NCTE, PCI, BCI, RPMC, RCI, GoR, NCVT and affiliated to BTU Bikaner, PDU Shekhawati University Sikar, RUHS, RAJUVAS, DARRAU Jodhpur, BTER, Jodhpur, SKNAU Jobner.
